Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Recently , the bridged dithiophene has attracted considerable attention as a donor unit because of its ability to fix the dithiophene system into a planar structure , which is much more efficient than the dithiophene in constructing highly - conjugated copolymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| bridged dithiophene |
| dithiophene |

The paragraph mentions two material names: "bridged dithiophene" and "dithiophene". These are the valid entities to be extracted from the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| bridged dithiophene |
| dithiophene |

The paragraph only mentions two entities that can be clearly identified as material names: "bridged dithiophene" and "dithiophene". These are the valid entities to be extracted from the paragraph. Other entities such as "recently", "attention", "ability to fix", "planar structure", "much more efficient", "highly-conjugated copolymers" do not refer to specific material names.
